name: Elakiri Dark Theme
description:
Complete dark style for Elakiri. In active development, feel free to use the source code for any customized modification.
Please do not use for commercial purposes.
additional_info:
Read Before Commenting

1. "Elakiri.com" logo is an image, hence cannot be themed.
2. Comments section is not themed fully.
3. Only works for "EK Lite" theme.
4. Only tested on Google Chrome.
